text:
="preserve">Josef Smolka (22 March 1939 – 1 June 2020) was a Czech volleyball player. He competed for Czechoslovakia in the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Troubky, Přerov District. In 1968 he was part of the Czechoslovak team which won the bronze medal in the Olympic tournament. He played seven matches.
Smolka died on 1 June 2020, aged 81.
